data.text: The stay at JA resorts was a complete experience for my family . With easy access to pools , splash park, sports cafe , beach and water activities we were spoiled for choice . I enjoyed the fabulous golf course a few times as well. With a great choice of restaurants and beach bars food and drinks are aplenty . The staff is very friendly and welcoming. I would come back here for sure . The icing on the cake is the ‘shooting club’ where you can try everything from pistols to automatic rifles …
data.title: Easter break with family

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Naveen Krishnan,

Thank you for such a glowing review of your family's Easter break at JA The Resort! We are thrilled to know you found your stay complete with all the amenities and activities we offer. It is great that the golf course, diverse dining options, and our shooting club stood out to you as highlights. 

We are especially grateful for your kind words about our associates friendliness and hospitality. Looking forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay!

Best regards,
Murad Ahmed
Resident Manager
JA The Resort
owner_response.author: Murad Ahmed

data.text: My stay was amazing, I liked to stay in this hotel because it’s very quiet and far from any traffic or noisy place that you can see the sun and the beach everything u can get, good staff good facilities they have in the hotel. I recommend people to stay in the hotel good for families
data.title: Wonderful

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Gala A,

Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that your stay with us was amazing and that you enjoyed the quiet, serene environment of our hotel. It is great to know that the views of the sun and beach added to your experience and that you were satisfied with our associates and facilities.

We are truly grateful for your recommendation and are delighted to hear that our hotel suited your family's needs. Our team works hard to ensure a relaxing and enjoyable experience for all our guests, and your kind words are a wonderful affirmation of their efforts.

We look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another peaceful stay. Until then, we wish you all the best!

Warm regards,
Murad Ahmed
Resident Manager
JA The Resort
owner_response.author: Murad Ahmed

data.text:
We are having a really lovely time at JA. The service is great, Nada was amazing at check in and went above and beyond to ensure we were extremely well looked after. 

The food offering is great - lunchtime at Captains Bar is convenient and great quality, and the service we receive from Kundan is friendly, patient, attentive and personable, 10 out of 10!!!!!!!!!!!!
data.title: Great time!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Leticia,

Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful experience at JA The Resort! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great time during your stay.

It is fantastic to know that Nada provided exceptional service during check-in and ensured that you were well taken care of. We will make sure to pass along your kind words to her.

We are also delighted that you enjoyed the food offerings at Captains Bar, and we are especially pleased to hear about the excellent service provided by Kundan. We strive to deliver top-notch service, and it is rewarding to hear that Kundan exceeded your expectations with his friendliness, patience, attentiveness, and personable approach.

Thank you for the glowing recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back to our resort for another memorable experience in the future!

Warm regards,
Murad Ahmed
Resident Manager
JA The Resort
owner_response.author: Murad Ahmed

data.text:
Super good service, Dalim was very service minder. The thing on the pictures was made of Dalim. 

The food was great, after you have eaten was there always some kind of desserts.

Free trolley rides are also excellent, they drove us all the time.
data.title: Good service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Alexander,

Thank you very much for taking the time to leave us such a positive review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our service, especially from Dalim who exemplifies a service-oriented mindset. It is wonderful to know that you found the food great and appreciated the desserts offered afterward.

We are also pleased that you enjoyed the buggy rides within the resort. We aim to provide convenient and enjoyable experiences for all our guests, and we are glad to hear that this was reflected in your visit.

We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another enjoyable experience.

Best regards,
Murad Ahmed
Resident Manager
JA The Resort
owner_response.author: Murad Ahmed

data.text:
We are the 07tg time in ithis Ressort and we are gain very happy. Good service and very friendly people

Especially Raju at the JA Beach Hotel is not only very friendly, he also works very good under pressure when too many people at once try to order drinks 

He always keep patient and friendly 

We would recommend anyone to have e vacation here
data.title: Best Service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Marcos P, 

Thank you for your loyalty and for choosing to stay with us at the JA Beach Hotel for the 7th time! We are thrilled to hear that you continue to have a happy and enjoyable experience with us.

It is fantastic to know that Raju has consistently provided you with excellent service. I will pass along your kind words to him.

We appreciate your recommendation and are delighted to have had the opportunity to host you once again. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more memorable stays soon! 

Best regards,
Murad Ahmed
Resident Manager
JA The Resort
owner_response.author: Murad Ahmed
